DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate bioequivalence ( amount pill ) metformin component canagliflozin metformin immediate release ( IR ) fix dose combination ( FDC ) tablet compare metformin IR tablet co-administered canagliflozin tablet healthy feed fasted participant .
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence Study Metformin Component Canagliflozin Metformin Fixed Dose Combination Immediate Release ( IR ) Tablet Comparing With Metformin IR Tablet Co-administered With Canagliflozin Tablet Healthy Fed Fasted Participants
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize ( study medication assign participant chance ) , open-label ( identity study drug know volunteer study staff ) , single-center , single-dose , 4-treatment , 4-way crossover ( method use switch participant one study group another clinical trial , like flip coin ) study healthy adult participant . The study 3 phase : Screening Phase ( approximately 3 week , Day -22 Day -2 ) , Open-Label Treatment Phase ( consist 4 single-dose treatment period 3 day [ Day -1 Day 2 ] , separate washout period 7 day ) Follow-up Phase ( 5 7 day last study-related procedure Day 2 treatment period 4 ) . All eligible participant randomly assign 1 4 treatment sequence receive 2 treatment fast 2 treatment fed condition . Blood sample collect pre-dose post-dose study treatment , understand pharmacokinetics ( drug absorb body , distribute within body , remove body time ) . Participants ' safety monitor throughout study .
